messages.content: As a society we should be ashamed of the fact that this is even a question. Let the suffering stop obviously.
feeling like im not normal and that im shameful and wrong and other people telling me those things are what have done this to me
And yet it looks like one thing you can't is read. Shame shame.
209 comments and we don’t get to read any? All that good pasta advice going to waste. Shame.
Its kinda odd,how theres always kinda a war between "Party music" and "Feelings Music"
That has gotten me killed a few times lately.
As a Ringwraith this offends me. Please build me a snowfort.
oh, rich people loooooooooooooooooooove to prey on the poor, they couldn't bear not raping, mocking, humiliating, profiting from, the 99%
Physical copies at my preffered online retailer actually sold out. Its crazy. For all platforms.
I don't think playing with her hair would work. Thats just creepy.
Things were significantly worse back then than they are now.
I did something along those lines almost 2 years ago and got to 67 upvotes before I got banned
That was my mistake. It should only show your First Name and The 1st letter of my last name.
they already ruined their own lives by having an affair. the other spouse knowing is just a consequence of their selfish actions.
